verbs.description: Amid [ARG0: the media and other folks] [V: losing] [ARG1: their minds] [ARGM-ADV: over President Donald Trump calling the notorious MS-13 gang " animals] , " would n't you know one of them who bragged about killing a teen boy goes by that very nickname ? Joel " Animal " Martinez , 23 — who was fully inducted into the MS-13 gang after slaying the 15-year - old — earned himself 40 years behind bars for the crime , The Associated Press reported . Martinez — a native of El Salvador who lived in Boston — was sentenced Tuesday , the outlet said , citing federal prosecutors in Massachusetts . He pleaded guilty in December to a racketeering conspiracy , which included the September 2015 killing of 15-year - old Irvin Javier de Paz Castro , the AP added . Prosecutors said Martinez admitted being associated with MS-13 and bragged about the stabbing in a secretly recorded conversation , the outlet reported . " I stabbed the culero three times , " Martinez said in the recording , Fox News reported , citing the U.S. Attorney 's …
